# Introduction

This repository contains the supplementary material for the conference paper titled "The impact of pause-internal phonetic particles on recall in synthesized lectures".

# TTS Comparison
This experiment compared passages in a natural (left) and synthetic (right) condition.

# Perceptual Experiment
This experiment evaluated synthetic passages in 3 different conditions: base (left), no PINTs (middle), and silence (right).
